headline: CloudFlare Joins Three More Peering Exchanges in Australia
keywords: Cloudflare Network, Peering, Data Center, Oceania, Australia
description: In the coming weeks, connectivity to CloudFlare in Australia is going to a new level. As part of CloudFlareâ€™s ongoing upgrades program, we established connections to three new Internet exchanges: the Megaport Internet exchanges in Sydney, Brisbane, and Melbourne.
